text: International Study Group diagnostic criteria for Behcet disease (2] Mandatory criterion « Recurrent (i., > 3 episodes within a 12-month period) oral aphthous ulcers « Recurrent genital ulceration o « Ocular manifestations (e.g., uveitis, retinal vasculitis) Additional criteria + Cutaneous lesions « Positive pathergy test after 24-48 hours Adiagnosis may be established in patients who fulfill the mandatory criterion PLUS > 2 of the additional criteria.
